Interface SeatRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Seat,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Seat,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Seat,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Seat,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Seat,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Seat>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Seat,Long>
@Repository public interface SeatRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Seat,Long>
Repository interface for managing Seat entities.

Provides methods to retrieve seats by hall, and to check seat availability for specific showtimes by querying existing confirmed bookings.

  • Method Details

    • findByHallOrderByRowAscNumberAsc

      List<Seat> findByHallOrderByRowAscNumberAsc(Hall hall)
      Retrieves all seats for a given hall, ordered by row ascending, then by seat number ascending.
      Parameters:
      hall - the Hall entity whose seats to retrieve
      Returns:
      a list of seats in the specified hall, ordered by row and number

    • countConflictingBookings

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(b) FROM Booking b JOIN b.seats s WHERE b.showtime.showtimeId = :showtimeId AND s.seatId IN :seatIds AND b.status <> 'CANCELLED'") long countConflictingBookings(@Param("showtimeId") Long showtimeId, @Param("seatIds") List<Long> seatIds)
      Counts the number of existing, confirmed bookings for a given showtime that include any of the specified seats.

      If this count is greater than zero, it indicates there is a booking conflict for one or more of the requested seats.

      Parameters:
      showtimeId - the ID of the showtime to check
      seatIds - a list of seat IDs that are requested for booking
      Returns:
      the number of conflicting bookings found for the given showtime and seats

    • findBookedSeatIdsByShowtimeId

      @Query("SELECT s.seatId FROM Booking b JOIN b.seats s WHERE b.showtime.showtimeId = :showtimeId AND b.status <> 'CANCELLED'") Set<Long> findBookedSeatIdsByShowtimeId(@Param("showtimeId") Long showtimeId)
      Finds the IDs of all seats that are part of a confirmed booking for a specific showtime.

      This is typically used to mark seats as unavailable (disabled) in the booking UI to prevent double booking.

      Parameters:
      showtimeId - the ID of the showtime for which booked seats are queried
      Returns:
      a set of seat IDs that are already booked and confirmed for the showtime
